Package ch.epfl.sdp.peakar.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AngleLowpassFilter
    Lowpass filter for angles.
    CameraUtilities
    Utility class for the Camera Activity, contains utility methods for the camera-preview and compass
    ImageHandler
    Utility class to retrieve pictures in their correct orientation
    ListAdapterInflater
    Class to inflate an layout.
    MainPagerAdapter
    Adapter that handles the displaying of the different main fragments of the application
    MapViewInScroll
    Used to override the dispatchEvent to handle the swipes on the MapView to be able to use the app while being able to use the ViewPager2 to change the activities when swiping from the edge
    MenuBarHandlerFragments
    Static handler for MenuBar.
    OfflineContentContainer  
    PermissionUtilities
    Utility class for the permissions
    POIPointsUtilities
    Utility class for the ComputePOIPoints class, contains utility methods to compute the POIPoints such as the filtering of the POIPoints
    SettingsUtilities
    Utility class for the Settings Activity, contains utility methods for the settings like the language
    StatusBarHandler
    Handler to set Status bar to different colors.
    StatusBarHandlerFragments
    Handler to set Status bar to different colors.
    StorageHandler
    Utility class to store and retrieve files
    TopBarHandlerFragments
    Only contains static functions to control the top bar that is to be displayed in several activities.
    UIUtils
    Class with only static utility functions for UI.
